scripts.build: npm run build-image && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-style && npm run build-html && npm run build-data && npm run build-locale && npm run build-sw && npm run build-manifest
scripts.build-style: npm run gulp sass && npm run gulp css
scripts.build-scripts: npm run gulp pre-scripts && npm run gulp scripts
scripts.build-image: npm run gulp image-high-quality && npm run gulp image-low-quality && npm run gulp webp-high-quality && npm run gulp webp-low-quality
